recipesJson.name: Leopards Blööd (Nic Salt Pod)
recipesJson.author: NastyNate
recipesJson.description: A POD variation of my recipe, Leopards Blööd. I didnt know how this would taste in my breeze 2, but I am very happy with it. I can taste all of the elements that were incorporated. I haven’t given it time to steep yet, but I am sure it will improve with time. Great as a SNV IMO.

reviews.text: This is a bonkers tasty recipe. The breading is light but still hits that soft pastry note, and the strawberries just meld everything together perfectly.
